name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, launch haiku reader”
”Alexa, begin haiku reader”
”Alexa, open haiku reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader provides an uplifting, inspiring poem on demand. 

There is a diverse collection of poems from classic to contemporary to suit any style. 
Dive into the wonder of words to find beauty in all things such as nature, animals and even the mundane.

Compatible with your Alexa app and all Alexa-enabled devices. 
Simply enable this skill using the waking word and Haiku Reader will provide a random listed poem instantly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
